oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Commemorative U. S. service medal
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Medal belonging to James S. Robey of Franklin, Kentucky. Robey was appointed 2nd Sergeant in November 30, 1861, and promoted to 1st Sergeant on June 4, 1862. He fought at Shiloh, Vicksburg, Baton Rouge, Stone Mountain, Jackson, and Chickamauga.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
